author: novicecpp
body:
FYI @belforte @mapellidario 

@smuzaffar Do you have any script in your shelve to automate this? 
Something like:
- Crab ops click run CI on Jenkins.
- CI do pull request to this repo.
- Your bot grabs this PR and tests without asking to test.
- You click merge when everything is green.

Is it possible?
title: bump crab-prod to v3.230227
